title: League of Enjoy whatever ride your bot lane throws you on.
body:
Title.
Only bot lane matters.
And mid lane to a lesser extent.
Jungler and top lane are passed out in the backseat.

replies.body: Yeah then you play bot lane. Win lane and find out the enemy team fed the enemy K6, and enemy Talon and you can't do shit.
Jungler matters a lot. Idk what you're talking about. Midlaners that roam also do great.

I had a game on my main yesterday where our botlane crushed theirs (like, 13-0 during lane phase), and then none of it mattered because the rest of our team was feeding their jungler a kill every minute.

Mid lane doesn't matter at all apparently. 9 min gunblade:
https://snag.gy/lanVEp.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Queen Weeß,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pb7A0fOo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-13T22:26:37.298+0000)
>
> Mid lane doesn't matter at all apparently. 9 min gunblade:
> https://snag.gy/lanVEp.jpg

Mid lane only has a impact(lesser than that of bot lane). By roaming bot lane...
XD How do you think I got a 9 min gunblade? Still wasn't enough : /

Well adcs never got their compensation buffs reverted. Get their items back. Get a steraks for no reason. Wow adcs are broken again who would have thought.

This game will forever be adcs or nothing just that's what it is. Apparently the biggest playerbase after or even before midlaner/mage players so yeah we can't ever expect this game to have other roles that truly matter. ADCs come online at one item. Bruisers get outscaled after one item. Ever played darius at like 6 items? Even with like 250-300 ad it's fuckin pathetic how little damage a bruiser actually deals apart from his 1k true dmg ult nukes. 

Everyone now has 2k+ base health in lategame. Mages even 2,5k. ON top of shields and heals and running around with 100+ armor. 

Midlane also pretty much only carries by roaming botlane.

Which is again why people get burned out so quickly. Every game you have to do the same. Roam botlane or lose the game because they int.

> [{quoted}](name=SuperTopLFBottom,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pb7A0fOo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-13T23:06:59.539+0000)
>
> Well adcs never got their compensation buffs reverted. Get their items back. Get a steraks for no reason. Wow adcs are broken again who would have thought.
> 
> This game will forever be adcs or nothing just that's what it is. Apparently the biggest playerbase after or even before midlaner/mage players so yeah we can't ever expect this game to have other roles that truly matter. ADCs come online at one item. Bruisers get outscaled after one item. Ever played darius at like 6 items? Even with like 250-300 ad it's fuckin pathetic how little damage a bruiser actually deals apart from his 1k true dmg ult nukes. 
> 
> Everyone now has 2k+ base health in lategame. Mages even 2,5k. ON top of shields and heals and running around with 100+ armor. 
> 
> Midlane also pretty much only carries by roaming botlane.
> 
> Which is again why people get burned out so quickly. Every game you have to do the same. Roam botlane or lose the game because they int.

Except we still lost 25% damage on infinity edge soooooo.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pb7A0fOo,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-06-13T23:34:17.014+0000)
>
> Except we still lost 25% damage on infinity edge soooooo.

ADC's are in the healthiest position they've been in a long time.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pb7A0fOo,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-06-14T10:37:03.529+0000)
>
> ADC's are in the healthiest position they've been in a long time.

I’m aware. Yet people still want to cry adcs are op. For no reason. When top lane still fucking exists with its broken ass.
You spelled toplane wrong. Because everything that comes out of that role is so blatantly busted no one else can deal with them.
Funny because the last few games I've played have always had a soft or hard feeding top laner.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pb7A0fOo,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-06-14T10:29:04.129+0000)
>
> Funny because the last few games I've played have always had a soft or hard feeding top laner.

Top laners are still playing a whole different useless minigame.
So you experienced one of those extremely rare games where a top laner had impact and got fed.
Doesnt really change the statistic that the higher ranked bot lane wins 87.91% of games.
meanwhile the higher ranked top laner wins 50.47% of games. So....

https://i.gyazo.com/2a3c53814da8b7bce5a487f3f20ddc2d.png

https://i.gyazo.com/b65570065df93fdde4718c56427c945d.png

https://i.gyazo.com/10aa116c2138986649e386dc486fb073.png 


Yeah........ Bot lane is clearly the reason.


/s
